cards.name: Alicia Spinnet
cards.flavorText: '... A penalty to Gryffindor, taken by Spinnet, who puts it away, no trouble ...' — Lee Jordan, commentator
effect: If there is a Match in play, whenever 1 of your cards that needs Quidditch Power does damage, it does 1 more damage.

cards.name: Aragog
cards.flavorText: 'A traveler gave me to Hagrid when I was an egg. Hagrid was only a boy, but he cared for me ...' — Aragog
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. Whenever another of your Spiders does damage, it does 2 more damage.

cards.name: Armando Dippet
effect: At the end of each of your turns, if you played a Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw, or Slytherin card, you may draw a card or do 2 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Cancelled Exams
cards.flavorText: '... the exams had been canceled as a school treat ...'
effect: Choose an opponent. On their next turn, they get 1 more Action. On your next turn, you get 2 more Actions.

cards.name: Chamber of Secrets
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'Naturally, the school has been searched for evidence of such a chamber ... It does not exist.' — Professor Binns
effect: Cards cannot be played from or leave their owners' discard piles.

cards.name: Dobby
cards.flavorText: 'The little creature on the bed had large, bat-like ears and bulging green eyes the size of tennis balls.'
effect: During each opponent's turn, you may prevent up to 4 damage done to you. If any damage is prevented in this way, at the end of that turn, that opponent may choose a non-Healing card in play other than Dobby. Return that card to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Dobby is Free!
effect: Your opponent may use Actions only to draw or play cards.
to solve: Your opponent uses Actions to play cards 4 times.
reward: Your opponent may choose 1 of your Characters in play. Their starting Character gains the abilities of the chosen Character until the end of their turn.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent uses Actions to play cards 4 times.
cards.reward: Your opponent may choose 1 of your Characters in play. Their starting Character gains the abilities of the chosen Character until the end of their turn.

cards.name: Drawing the Sword
cards.flavorText: 'Only a true Gryffindor could have pulled that out of the hat, Harry.' — Albus Dumbledore
effect: Play this card only if you have a Gryffindor Witch or Wizard in play. Do 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of Creatures.

cards.name: Dueling Club
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'I wouldn't mind dueling lessons; they might come in handy one of these days ...' — Seamus Finnigan
effect: At the end of each player's turn, if that player used an Action to play a Spell, they draw a card.

cards.name: Dumbledore's Suspension
cards.note: Play this card only if you have at least 4 Lessons in play.
effect: Your opponent's starting Character loses all abilities (including any Lessons provided).
to solve: Your opponent skips a total of 3 Actions.
reward: The next Spell your opponent plays needs 2 less Power to play.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 3 Actions.
cards.reward: The next Spell your opponent plays needs 2 less Power to play.

cards.name: Immobulus
effect: Choose an opponent. During their next turn, prevent all damage done to you by their Creatures. Until the beginning of your next turn, if 1 of their Creatures takes damage, discard that Creature.

cards.name: Katie Bell
cards.flavorText: '... nice dive around Flint, up off the field ...' — Lee Jordan, commentator
effect: If there is a Match in play, whenever a card (yours or an opponent's) does damage to you, it does 1 less damage.

cards.name: Loyalty's Reward
effect: Choose 5 non-Healing cards, of different types, in your discard pile. Your opponent chooses 1 of those cards. Put that card on the bottom of your deck and the rest into your hand. (You must choose 5 cards.)

cards.name: Lucius' Cane
effect: At the end of each of your turns, do 2 damage to your opponent for each Action you have used after the second Action. (If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.)

cards.name: Lucius Malfoy
cards.flavorText: 'The man ... could only be Draco's father. He had the same pale, pointed face and identical cold, gray eyes.'
effect: At the end of each of your turns, if you have used 5 or more Actions, you may search your deck, take any card, put it into your hand, and then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Millicent Bulstrode
cards.flavorText: 'She was large and square and her heavy jaw jutted aggressively.'
effect: Once per turn, you may use an Action to do 1 damage to an opponent's Creature.

cards.name: Moaning Myrtle
effect: Once per game, you may choose an opponent's card in play. If the chosen card is discarded from play, do 8 damage to that opponent.

cards.name: Muddled Memories
cards.flavorText: 'I think I'm the one attacking everyone, Tom!'” — Ginny Weasley
effect: Look at an opponent's hand. You may choose 1 of those cards. If you do, on their next turn, they must use their first Action(s) to play that card. (If your opponent cannot play that card, this ability has no effect.)

cards.name: Polyjuice Potion
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Choose 1 of an opponent's Wizards or Witches in play. Your starting Character gains all abilities of that card until the end of your turn.

cards.name: Prof. Gilderoy Lockhart
cards.flavorText: 'Fame's a fickle friend, Harry ... Celebrity is as celebrity does. Remember that.' — Professor Gilderoy Lockhart
effect: At the end of each player's turn, if you have discarded a card from your hand, choose an opponent. They discard a card from their hand.

cards.name: Slytherin's Basilisk
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. At the end of each of your turns, you may choose 1 of an opponent's Characters or Creatures in play and put a petrification counter on it. Cards with petrification counters lose all abilities and do no damage. When this card leaves play, remove all petrification counters from play.

cards.name: Swallowed Snitch
effect: During your turn, if your hand contains at least 4 cards, you may discard this card from play. If you do, discard your hand to win the current Match.

cards.name: Tom Marvolo Riddle
cards.flavorText: 'Brilliant. Of course, he was probably the most brilliant student Hogwarts has ever seen.' — Albus Dumbledore
effect: Once during each of your turns, when you play a Lesson, you may choose a Lesson type. Until the end of your turn, this card provides 1 Power of the chosen type.

cards.name: Wandering Knockturn
cards.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.
effect: After your opponent uses an Action to play a Creature or Item, they discard that card from play.
to solve: Your opponent discards 2 cards in this way.
reward: Your opponent may put up to 2 Lessons from their discard pile into play.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent discards 2 cards in this way.
cards.reward: Your opponent may put up to 2 Lessons from their discard pile into play.

cards.name: Aragog's Lair
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'Aragog clicked his pincers furiously, and all around the hollow the sound was echoed by the crowd of spiders ...'
effect: Each Spider has 2 more Health (even your opponents').

cards.name: Arania Exumai
cards.flavorText: 'Even as he reached for his wand, Harry knew it was no good, there were too many of them ...'
effect: Do 2 damage to a Creature of your choice. Then do 3 damage to all Spider Creatures (even your own).

cards.name: Basilisk Fang
effect: When you play this card, do 2 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice. You may use an Action to discard this card from play. If you do, choose an opponent's Item in play and discard it.

cards.name: Bowtruckle
cards.flavorText: 'I just happen to have met several of these exotic plants on my travels ...' — Professor Gilderoy Lockhart
effect: When another of your Plants takes damage, this card deals 1 damage to an opponent of your choice.

cards.name: Break with a Banshee
effect: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, choose a non-Healing Match with printed Power cost of 1 in your discard pile. Play it as if it were in your hand. (You must still use an Action to play the card.)

cards.name: Circling the Goal Posts
effect: Do 3 damage to an opponent. Then draw a card. At the end of each of your turns, if this card is in your discard pile and a Spell did at least 5 damage to an opponent, you may discard a card from your hand to put this card into your hand.

cards.name: Cornish Pixie
effect: When you play this card, look at an opponent's hand. You may choose a card and place it under this card. (Cards under this card cannot be interacted with.) When this card leaves play, return that card to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Deathday Party
effect: Whenever a card is discarded from play, your opponent says, 'Rest in peace.' If your opponent forgets, they take 3 damage at the end of the turn.
to solve: Your opponent chooses 3 Lessons in their hand and discards them.
reward: Your opponent may look at your hand. They may choose 1 of those cards and discard it.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 3 Lessons in their hand and discards them.
cards.reward: Your opponent may look at your hand. They may choose 1 of those cards and discard it.

cards.name: Draco's Superiority
cards.flavorText: 'Everyone's just been admiring the brooms my father's bought our team.' — Draco Malfoy
effect: Search your deck. You may take a Broom from your deck, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. If that card's printed Power cost is at least 5, do 5 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Essential Knowledge Test
effect: Whenever you would draw a card, except during your draw step, you may choose not to.

cards.name: Gadding with Ghouls
effect: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, choose a non-Healing Item with printed Power cost of 2 or less in your discard pile. Play it as if it were in your hand. (You must still use an Action to play the card.)

cards.name: Hogwarts Pipes
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'But how's the basilisk been getting around the place?' — Ron Weasley
effect: When any player takes damage, they discard cards from the bottom of their deck instead of the top.

cards.name: Holidays with Hags
effect: You may use an Action and discard this card from play. If you do, put up to 2 Lessons of the same type from your discard pile into play.

cards.name: Kheshakhassa
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Search your deck. You may take a Location that needs Potions Power with printed Power cost 5 or less from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Lockhart's Office
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'Shining brightly on the walls by the light of many candles were countless framed photographs of Lockhart.'
effect: Once during each player's turn, that player may discard any number of cards from their hand.

cards.name: Magical Me
effect: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, choose a non-Healing Spell with printed Power cost of 2 or less in your discard pile. Play it as if it were in your hand. (You must still use an Action to play the card.)

cards.name: Mandrake Draught
effect: Choose 1 of your Characters in play that has a 'Once per turn' ability that you have already used this turn. Use that ability again without using any Actions.

cards.name: Quidditch Plaque
effect: Your Beaters, Chasers, Keepers, and Seekers need 1 fewer Action to play. (If this means you would use fewer than 1 Action, you still use 1 Action.)

cards.name: Skurge
effect: Choose 2 of your non-Healing cards in play of different card types (other than your starting Character). Discard 1 of them and return the other to your hand.

cards.name: Spellotape
effect: If you would discard another Item from play due to an opponent's card, discard this card instead.

cards.name: Vera Verto
effect: Choose a Creature in play. It becomes an Item that has no abilities, damage each turn, health, or keywords (except Unique) while it is in play.

cards.name: Voyages with Vampires
effect: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, choose a Creature with printed Power cost 2 or less in your discard pile. Play it as if it were in your hand. (You must still use an Action to play the card.)

cards.name: Whispers from the Pipes
effect: Before each of your opponent's turns, they reveal the top card of their deck. You may take 1 damage to put that card on the bottom of their deck.
to solve: Your opponent puts their hand on the bottom of their deck in any order.
reward: Your opponent names a card type. Reveal your hand and discard all cards of the chosen type.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent puts their hand on the bottom of their deck in any order.
cards.reward: Your opponent names a card type. Reveal your hand and discard all cards of the chosen type.

cards.name: Winter Match
cards.flavorText: 'I haven't been properly dry since August' — George Weasley
effect: to win: Draw cards 7 times while this card is in play. (Drawing multiple cards at a time counts once.)
prize: The winner may put a card from their discard pile into their hand.
cards.toWin: Draw cards 7 times while this card is in play. (Drawing multiple cards at a time counts once.)
cards.prize: The winner may put a card from their discard pile into their hand.

cards.name: Baby Acromantula
cards.flavorText: '... I cannot deny them fresh meat, when it wanders so willingly into our midst.' — Aragog
effect: When you play this card, search your deck. You may take a Baby Acromantula from your deck, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Cauldron Calamity
effect: To play this card, discard any number of your Potions Lessons from play. For each Potions Lesson discarded, do 2 damage to an opponent or to a Creature of your choice. (You may choose the same target multiple times.)

cards.name: Colin's Camera
effect: Before each of your turns, draw a card. Then all your opponents draw a card.

cards.name: Dodging the Bludger
cards.flavorText: '... he looped and swooped, spiraled, zigzagged, and rolled ... avoiding another fierce dive from the Bludger.'
effect: Do 2 damage to an opponent. Then draw a card. You may put a Quidditch Lesson from your hand into play.

cards.name: Dueling Practice
cards.flavorText: ''I said disarm only!' Lockhart shouted in alarm over the heads of the battling crowd ...'
effect: Do 1 damage to an opponent. At the end of your turn, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Eat Slugs
cards.flavorText: '... he gave an almighty belch and several slugs dribbled out of his mouth onto his lap.'
effect: Do 2 damage to yourself. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Enemies of the Heir, Beware
effect: Choose an opponent and a card type. They reveal their hand, discard all cards of the chosen type, and take damage equal to the number of cards discarded in this way.

cards.name: Expelliarmus
cards.flavorText: 'There was a dazzling flash of scarlet light and Lockhart was blasted off his feet ...'
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items in play and discard it. If that item was a Wand, during their next turn, they can't use Actions to play Spells.

cards.name: Forest Spider
cards.flavorText: 'Spiders the size of carthorses, eight-eyed, eight-legged, black, hairy, gigantic.'
effect: While this card is in your hand, it requires 1 less Power to play for each of your Spiders in play.

cards.name: Mimblewimble
effect: Do 4 damage to an opponent. During their next turn, they can't use their first Action to play Spells.

cards.name: Mis-Brewed Polyjuice
effect: Count the number of Characters an opponent has in play and in their discard pile. Do that much damage to that opponent. Then, choose 1 of their Characters in play. Until their next turn, that Character loses all abilities.

cards.name: Mortal Enemies
cards.flavorText: 'Fawkes was soaring around its head, and the basilisk was snapping furiously at him with fangs long and thin as sabers ...'
effect: Choose 1 of your Creatures in play and 1 of an opponent's Creatures in play. They do damage to each other.

cards.name: New Slytherin Seeker
cards.flavorText: ''All right there, Scarhead?' yelled Malfoy, shooting underneath him as though to show off the speed of his broom.'
effect: Do 5 damage to an opponent. If there is a Match in play, you may have that opponent choose 1 of their Creatures in play and discard it.

cards.name: Old Sock
cards.flavorText: ''Got a sock,' said Dobby in disbelief. 'Master threw it, and Dobby caught it ...''
effect: When you play this card, draw a card.

cards.name: Parseltongue
cards.flavorText: 'A Parselmouth! You can talk to snakes!' — Ron Weasley
effect: Choose an opponent's Creature in play and return it to their hand. If you have Snake in play, discard your opponent's Creature instead.

cards.name: Peskipiksi Pesternomi
cards.flavorText: 'It had absolutely no effect; one of the pixies seized his wand and threw it out of the window, too.'
effect: Discard all Wands in play.

cards.name: Petrifying Stare
cards.flavorText: 'But no one’s died — because no one looked it straight in the eye.' — Harry Potter
effect: Choose an opponent's Character (other than their starting Character) or non-Rooster Creature in play. Shuffle that card into their deck.

cards.name: Pre-Match Handshake
cards.flavorText: '... giving each other threatening stares and gripping rather harder than was necessary ...'
effect: Each player searches their deck. They may take a Lesson from their deck, reveal it, and put it into their hand. Each player shuffles their deck. Then you may put a Quidditch Lesson from your hand into play.

cards.name: Quaffle
effect: When you play this card, search your deck. You may take a Match from your deck, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Quidditch Confidence
effect: Play this card only if there is a Match in play. Trade total progress toward winning a Match with an opponent. Then do 4 damage to that opponent.

cards.name: Rooster
cards.flavorText: '... the Basilisk flees only from the crowing of a rooster, which is fatal to it.'
effect: Slytherin's Basilisk cannot be played.

cards.name: Sink Passageway
cards.flavorText: 'It looked like an ordinary sink ... And then Harry saw it: Scratched on the side of one of the copper taps was a tiny snake.'
effect: Put a non-Healing Location from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Skele-Gro
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Choose 3 different non-Healing cards in your discard pile. Your opponent chooses 1 of those cards. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Slower Brooms
effect: All cards with a Power cost (yours and your opponents') need 1 more Power to play. If you play this card and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

cards.name: Substitute Cat
effect: Search your deck. You may take an Item or Creature with printed Power cost less than or equal to the number of Lessons you have in play, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Swish and Flick
cards.flavorText: 'Now, don't forget that nice wrist movement we've been practicing!' — Professor Filius Flitwick
effect: Put a Lesson from your discard pile into play.

cards.name: Wizard Duel
effect: Each player discards the top card of their deck. Do 8 damage to each player who discarded a card with the lowest printed Power cost. (Cards with no printed Power cost count as 0.)
